## [Stream Quality Status in Ottawa County, MI](docs/Map_Challenge.html)
- In this assignment I wanted to show stream status in Ottawa County, Michigan. I ussed stream status data, streams/river vector data, and counties vector data as bounding box. The large data sets (NLCD_2024_CU.tif and Assessment_Units_2024_-_Rivers_and_Streams.geojson)
